dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: Grrrr... Who dares to tread on Ignar's domain? Speak quickly or be consumed by fire!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I'm Zarathos, and I seek dominion over this land.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ha! Challenges speak loudly. But fire answers louder.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Join me, and you shall taste the blood of our enemies.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ignar needs not promises, but action! Show me your power!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Watch as I summon the darkest magics!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Impressive. But... I still see weakness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I'll reduce you to ash if you refuse.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Such boldness... will be your doom.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Unite with me, or be crushed under my heel.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your threats amuse me. Do you have the strength to enforce them?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I command forces that shall flatten cities!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hmmm... impressive words. Yet actions speak louder.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I'll show you the might of my dark cabal.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Another promise! Show your might, or begone.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Do you not tire of these barren grounds, creature?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ignar knows only fire and fangs. What else is there?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: A realm of endless shadow, under my rule.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bah! Shadows are weak against flame.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Riches and power beyond your wildest dreams.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hmmm. Sparkling promises... but no fire.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Step aside, worm, or face the wrath of Zarathos.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish mortal! Threats mean nothing to Ignar!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then feel the power of my darkness!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Such arrogance! I'll burn you to cinders!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Prepare to be annihilated!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: I welcome your challenge, weakling!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Craven fool, beg for mercy!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Mercy is for the weak. Prepare to die!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your fire will be extinguished by my shadow.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ignar's flame is eternal, unlike your feeble darkness.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then let us see which is stronger!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: I relish the chance to burn you alive!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You shall regret crossing me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Regret is for the fallen. Prepare to fall!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have no time to waste on a mere worm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then leave, or feel the burn of lava!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have better things to do.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Begone, weakling. Ignar has no time.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You'll rue the day you dismissed me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Words without fire. Begone.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I'm here to gather dark artifacts. Stand down.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ignar guards his territory fiercely. None shall pass.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You have no choice in the matter.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ignar always has a choice: fight or devour!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then you shall be devoured first.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Try, weakling. Your doom awaits!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Do you wish to test me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A battle it is then!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Stay out of my way, and maybe I'll let you live.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Weak threats from a foolish mortal.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: My threats are backed by power.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then let your power speak for you!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You have been warned.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ignar hears, but does not fear.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Why don't you aid me, and taste victory?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ignar needs no allies to taste victory!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Together, we could conquer even greater foes.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Hmmm... an interesting proposition. Perhaps...

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then be crushed alone.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ignar fears no threats. Prepare yourself!
